short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover GMB categories, GMB audits. Monitor, analyze, and outshine your GMB competitors using this powerful Local SEO tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗦𝗽𝘆, 𝗔𝘂𝗱𝗶𝘁, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗼𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗠𝘆 𝗕𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 (𝗚𝗠𝗕) 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗲𝘁𝗶𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗟𝗼𝗰𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝗘𝗢 𝗧𝗼𝗼𝗹!🔍
Elevate your Local SEO game and crush your competition with our powerful GMB tool. Analyze GMB categories, perform in-depth audits, review your competitor’s GMB strategy, and boost your own Google Business Profile ranking—directly in your browser.
🚀 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗕𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗳𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗧𝗼𝗼𝗹
Easily access Google My Business (GMB) categories, conduct basic audits, review audits, post audits, check location ranking, and so much more—all without leaving Google. Turbocharge your GMB listing, spy on competitors, and dominate local search results with real-time insights. 💥
🚀 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗨𝘀𝗲 𝗜𝘁?
1️⃣ 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 from this page.
2️⃣ 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲, and you’ll instantly see the GMB categories and audit buttons on every business page and search result page by default. It works seamlessly on Google Search, Google Local Finder, and more.
⭐ 𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀
We aim to provide exceptional value to our customers by offering a comprehensive Local SEO solution. Here’s what you can do with the extension:
⭐ 𝗚𝗠𝗕 𝗖𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀
One of the most important factors in Google Map rankings is the categories assigned to your business. With this extension, you can easily view these categories on various pages, including:
Google Business Pages
Google Search Results
Local Finder Pages
Google Business Pages with bottom selectors
⭐ The primary category is marked with a ⭐, making it easier to identify the main category driving your rankings.
⭐ 𝗕𝗮𝘀𝗶𝗰 𝗚𝗠𝗕 𝗔𝘂𝗱𝗶𝘁
Conduct quick, detailed audits of any business, uncovering essential information such as:
Business claimed status
Location information
Place ID, CID, and Business Profile ID
Knowledge Panel link
GMB Review & Post Links
Other businesses at the same address or using the same website
Website auditing shortcuts
⭐ 𝗧𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲
Ranking on Google Maps can vary based on the searcher’s location. With Teleport, simulate searches from different locations to see your ranking and competition at those spots. 🚀
Features include:
Add a search term, select a location, and view rankings
Analyze competition in that specific location
Measure the distance of your business from any location
⭐ 𝗚𝗠𝗕 𝗥𝗲𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘄 𝗔𝘂𝗱𝗶𝘁
Reviews play a huge role in GMB rankings. Our Review Audit helps you analyze the health of any business’s reviews, giving you:
Graphical representation of reviews over time
Review rating calculation
Review content analysis
Quality analysis
Strategic insights for improving your review game 📈
⭐ 𝗚𝗠𝗕 𝗣𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗔𝘂𝗱𝗶𝘁
Analyze your competitors' GMB post strategy, including:
Post frequency
Content strategy
Graphical representation of post trends
Insights for crafting an effective post strategy 📝
⭐ 𝗖𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿
Find the most relevant categories and services for your business with the Category Finder tool.
Discover related categories
Uncover associated search traffic
Identify relevant services
Analyze seasonal changes in category searches
⭐ 𝗢𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿 𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀
Transparent data calculations
Display results directly in Google, Google Local Finder, and M Search
No data export from GMB
🚀 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗡𝗼𝘁𝗲𝘀:
We are not affiliated with Keyword Everywhere, Keyword Surfer, or PlePer.
We also don’t export data, but provide links to external audit tools like GatherUp and UberSuggest.
